name: A Day at Home with Mom!
name_original: A Day at Home with Mom!
description:
This piece is not so much about a specific day in time, but about a day that I encounter when at home spending time with my Mom. This is a HTML and CSS based text game, with embedded hyperlinks and images. I use a "gauntlet" style tree structure with looping side paths that allow you to skip forward, see new dialogue/interactions, and make more decisions. 

I tried to channel an air of peace and joy when making this piece. These are days that I remember so fondly, and bring me so much happiness. I want the player to have an easy time playing through this game.  Hopefully, I can share a bit of my familial happiness with everyone who plays :)
